title: Refactor Task.id and Feature.id into UUIDs.
description:
Write a script that will go over all the tasks and features and will update them with this new UUID.
This means that all dependency references must be updated to be matching:
'{taskId}.{featureId}' or '{taskId}'

The display index of a feature is its position in the task's feature list.
The display index of a task in the main list must be stored - in the ProjectSpec.
There needs to be some way of looking these indices up quickly - as whenever a dependency is shown to the user it should shown as:
'{taskIndex}.{featureIndex}' 

The dependencyResolver should be updated accordingly too.
